alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Hunt; Kaufman; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 9:05AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Hunt, central Kaufman, Van Zandt, southwestern Hopkins and Rains Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 904 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Terrell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Terrell, Kaufman, Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Crandall, Van, Combine, West Tawakoni, Talty, Edgewood, Quinlan, Emory, East Tawakoni, Hawk Cove, Fruitvale, Lake Tawakoni State Park, Point, Oak Grove and Lone Oak. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 493 and 542. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hopkins; Hunt; Kaufman; Rains; Van Zandt
